Placemark.name: GATE
Placemark.description:
Address: Gate Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: This year (2017) the Gate will open at 12:01 am on Sunday, August 27, and close at 12 pm on Tuesday, September 5.
Contact: http://gate.burningman.com/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: This year (2017) the Gate will open at 12:01 am on Sunday, August 27, and close at 12 pm on Tuesday, September 5.

Placemark.name: Box Office
Placemark.description:
Address: Gate Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: You can access the Box Office from all lanes of traffic. Gate staff will direct you to where to park. If one person in your vehicle has a Will Call ticket, the entire vehicle must stop at the Box Office to get your tickets/vehicle pass. Return to your vehicle and proceed to the Main Gate. Please do not get out of your vehicle until you are parked in the Will Call lot.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: You can access the Box Office from all lanes of traffic. Gate staff will direct you to where to park. If one person in your vehicle has a Will Call ticket, the entire vehicle must stop at the Box Office to get your tickets/vehicle pass. Return to your vehicle and proceed to the Main Gate. Please do not get out of your vehicle until you are parked in the Will Call lot.

Placemark.name: Greeters Station
Placemark.description:
Address: Gate Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Welcome Home, Burners!
Contact: http://burningman.org/event/volunteering/teams/greeters/

Placemark.name: Center Camp Cafe
Placemark.description:
Address: Center Camp
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Café is our community gathering space, where coffee, tea and other beverages are available for purchase, and your fellow BRC citizens provide a wide variety of on-stage entertainment. Bustling 24 hours a day from Sunday 8/27 - Monday 9/4! 
BRING YOUR OWN CUP!
Contact: http://burningman.org/event/black-rock-city-guide/infrastructure/center-camp-cafe/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: The Café is our community gathering space, where coffee, tea and other beverages are available for purchase, and your fellow BRC citizens provide a wide variety of on-stage entertainment. Bustling 24 hours a day from Sunday 8/27 - Monday 9/4! BRING YOUR OWN CUP!

Placemark.name: Playa Info
Placemark.description:
Address: 1:00 and Center Camp Plaza
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Playa Info in Center Camp is staffed by knowledgeable volunteers ready to answer your questions, 9 am to 6 pm, unless otherwise posted. You can use the Playa Info Directory 24/7 to register yourself and your camp location and look up friends, or find and post theme camp locations, event schedules, rideshares, services, information and Lost + Found. NOTE: there is no Internet access. Playa Info’s large BRC map shows public theme camp locations, and bulletin boards are available for posting events, messages and general information.
Contact: playainfo@burningman.org



https://www.youtube.com/embed/WIFpeTcaiz4

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Playa Info in Center Camp is staffed by knowledgeable volunteers ready to answer your questions, 9 am to 6 pm, unless otherwise posted. You can use the Playa Info Directory 24/7 to register yourself and your camp location and look up friends, or find and post theme camp locations, event schedules, rideshares, services, information and Lost + Found. NOTE: there is no Internet access. Playa Info’s large BRC map shows public theme camp locations, and bulletin boards are available for posting events, messages and general information.

Placemark.name: ESD Station 3:00 (Medical)
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:00 and Ceremony
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: As a member of a community built on self-reliance, YOU are responsible for your own health and basic first aid. We can’t stress this enough — bring your own first aid kid and medications, stay hydrated, and act responsibly. Please don’t overwhelm our medical staff with minor complaints and requests for over-the-counter supplies or medication. However, if you or someone you know (or encounter) requires medical assistance, you may contact an Emergency Services Department volunteer or a Black Rock Ranger, or visit one of our six Medical Stations. Stations are located at 5:15 and Esplanade and behind the 3:00 and 9:00 Plazas. We will also have three smaller satellite stations behind the 4:30 and 7:30 Plazas on H, and between the Temple and the Man. All are easily identified by a large lit red cross. Trained emergency medical personnel are on duty 24 hours a day.
Contact: 911@burningman.org

Placemark.name: Ranger Headquarters
Placemark.description:
Address: 1:00 and Rod's Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock Rangers are BRC’s volunteer community mediation team; they can help you find solutions to problems that you can't immediately resolve yourself.
Contact: http://rangers.burningman.com/

Placemark.name: F.U.N. (Family Unification Network)
Placemark.description:
Address: Black Rock Rangers HQ
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Family Unification Network (F.U.N.)
Register your kids  at the Black Rock Ranger HQ in Center Camp (daily from 8am-11am and 1-5pm.)
The registered child will receive a wristband with a serial number that is unique to them, which will identify the child, parents and camp location. That’s all you have to do! Should your child become separated from you, all he or she has to do is find a Ranger. The wristband serial number will facilitate a speedy reunion.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Family Unification Network (F.U.N.) Register your kids at the Black Rock Ranger HQ in Center Camp (daily from 8am-11am and 1-5pm.) The registered child will receive a wristband with a serial number that is unique to them, which will identify the child, parents and camp location. That’s all you have to do! Should your child become separated from you, all he or she has to do is find a Ranger. The wristband serial number will facilitate a speedy reunion.

Placemark.name: Fire Camp (ESD Fire Dept)
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:20 and  Ceremony
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Fire Camp is the main fire station for Burning Man. Complete with a fire station facade out front. Camping is open to all ESD volunteers.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Fire Camp is the main fire station for Burning Man. Complete with a fire station facade out front. Camping is open to all ESD volunteers.

Placemark.name: Zendo
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:15 and Awe
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Crisis Intervention Services
The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth. The Zendo facilities are entirely run by participants and are near 5:15 and Awe Street.
Contact: http://www.zendoproject.org/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Crisis Intervention Services The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth. The Zendo facilities are entirely run by participants and are near 5:15 and Awe Street.

Placemark.name: BLM / Pershing County Sheriff's Office
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:30 and Esplanade
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Bureau of Land Management and the Pershing County Sheriff's Office will have a substation around Center Camp. Stop by to report a crime, fill out a crime report, or just to show your appreciation for the law enforcement professionals who work so hard to keep Black Rock City safe.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Bureau of Land Management and the Pershing County Sheriff's Office will have a substation around Center Camp. Stop by to report a crime, fill out a crime report, or just to show your appreciation for the law enforcement professionals who work so hard to keep Black Rock City safe.

Placemark.name: BRC3PO
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:00 Civic Plaza at Breath
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock City Post Office The Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services and so much more. Set in a giant rural post box open up to 24 hours per day BRC3PO is a destination camp for real one-on-one interaction that can range from the supremely silly to the sublime. Our "customers" often become performers in an ongoing spontaneous cabaret. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO. YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO if you pay us a visit! Our excuse for interaction is postcards which you can send to your friends in BRC or anywhere in the world. You come with your imagination and your willingness to play. We provide the postcards.
Contact: https://www.facebook.com/BRC3PO

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Black Rock City Post Office The Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services and so much more. Set in a giant rural post box open up to 24 hours per day BRC3PO is a destination camp for real one-on-one interaction that can range from the supremely silly to the sublime. Our "customers" often become performers in an ongoing spontaneous cabaret. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO. YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO if you pay us a visit! Our excuse for interaction is postcards which you can send to your friends in BRC or anywhere in the world. You come with your imagination and your willingness to play. We provide the postcards.

Placemark.name: BRCPO main
Placemark.description:
Address: Center Camp
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock City Post Office (open 10am-10pm)
There’s no team in Fuck You! We provide service and delivery of your U.S. and playa mail, on and off the playa. Come trade post cards, stamps, stories and deliver the mail. We provide performance art, socialization, integration, certified documentation and BRC citizenship. Come join the team!
Contact: brcpo@yahoo.com

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Black Rock City Post Office (open 10am-10pm) There’s no team in Fuck You! We provide service and delivery of your U.S. and playa mail, on and off the playa. Come trade post cards, stamps, stories and deliver the mail. We provide performance art, socialization, integration, certified documentation and BRC citizenship. Come join the team!

Placemark.description:
Address: 9:00 Civic Plaza at Breath
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Black Rock City International Post Office. Embracing Bureaucracy since 2008
Contact: https://www.facebook.com/BRCPO9 
http://brcpo2oh.weebly.com/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: The Black Rock City International Post Office. Embracing Bureaucracy since 2008

Placemark.name: Ice Cubed
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:00 G Plaza
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ice is available in crushed or blocks for $4/bag.

Ice is sold at Arctica in Center Camp, and in the 3:00 and 9:00 plazas, now on Genuflect.

During the event, Monday to Saturday hours are 9 am to 6 pm, Sunday noon to 6 pm.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value:
Ice is available in crushed or blocks for $4/bag.
Ice is sold at Arctica in Center Camp, and in the 3:00 and 9:00 plazas, now on Genuflect.
During the event, Monday to Saturday hours are 9 am to 6 pm, Sunday noon to 6 pm.

Placemark.name: Arctica (Center Camp)
Placemark.description:
Address: 8:45 and Center Camp Plaza
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ice is available in crushed or blocks for $4/bag.

Ice is sold at Arctica in Center Camp, and in the 3:00 and 9:00 plazas, now on Genuflect.

During the event, Monday to Saturday hours are 9 am to 6 pm, Sunday noon to 6 pm and Exodus Monday in Center Camp only from 9 am to noon.

Pre-event, ice is available at Center Camp Arctica. Hours are Thursday through Sunday from noon to 6 pm. 
Contact: gentle@burningman.org

Placemark.description:
Address: 11:55 and Rod's Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: First Camp functions as a business management center and BRC's home to the Board of Directors and Management Staff
Contact:

Placemark.name: The Pavilion
Placemark.description:
Address: on the Esplanade
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Pavilion now houses the ARTery and Everywhere 
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: The Pavilion now houses the ARTery and Everywhere

Placemark.name: Everywhere
Placemark.description:
Address: located in The Pavilion
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Everywhere Pavilion serves as a point of connection between Black Rock Citizens and off-playa worldwide Burning Man-related projects and culture. Come learn about the REGIONALS NETWORK, Burning Man Arts’ off-playa programs, BURNERS WITHOUT BORDERS, and BLACK ROCK SOLAR as well as connect with other like-minded burners about your year-round efforts to bring Burning Man culture to the rest of the world.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: The Everywhere Pavilion serves as a point of connection between Black Rock Citizens and off-playa worldwide Burning Man-related projects and culture. Come learn about the REGIONALS NETWORK, Burning Man Arts’ off-playa programs, BURNERS WITHOUT BORDERS, and BLACK ROCK SOLAR as well as connect with other like-minded burners about your year-round efforts to bring Burning Man culture to the rest of the world.

Placemark.name: ARTery
Placemark.description:
Address: located in The Pavilion
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Burning Man Art Team
On-playa, our headquarters is located in Center Camp and functions as a check-in center for artists, as well as a hub for information about art. Open daily from Tues 8/22 from 9am-6pm.
Contact: http://burningman.org/event/black-rock-city-guide/infrastructure/the-artery/
http://burningman.org/event/volunteering/teams/artist-services/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Burning Man Art Team On-playa, our headquarters is located in Center Camp and functions as a check-in center for artists, as well as a hub for information about art. Open daily from Tues 8/22 from 9am-6pm.

Placemark.name: Media Mecca
Placemark.description:
Address: 10:30 and Center Camp Plaza
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock City's press room (open 10am-5pm daily starting Sunday 8/27) Media Mecca is home to the members of the Media Team that volunteer to assist press filmmakers photographers and other members of the media in the endeavor to document the cultural story of Black Rock City and Burning Man. Come on by to register your media project for publication or to meet up with other photographers videographers or journalists
Contact: press@burningman.org
https://burningman.org/press

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Black Rock City's press room (open 10am-5pm daily starting Sunday 8/27) Media Mecca is home to the members of the Media Team that volunteer to assist press filmmakers photographers and other members of the media in the endeavor to document the cultural story of Black Rock City and Burning Man. Come on by to register your media project for publication or to meet up with other photographers videographers or journalists

Placemark.name: BRC Census
Placemark.description:
Address: 11:00 Center Camp Plaza
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: BRC Census collects demographic and attitudinal data of participants for the Burning Man organization. Be counted!
Contact: https://www.facebook.com/BlackRockCityCensus

Data.name: Description
Data.value: BRC Census collects demographic and attitudinal data of participants for the Burning Man organization. Be counted!

Placemark.name: V-Spot 3
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:00 and Awe
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: V-Spot3 is Burning Man’s Volunteer Resource Team's 3:00 location in Black Rock City. The Volunteer Resource Team helps turn citizens into participants throughout the year and at Black Rock City.
Contact: vspot@burningman.org
https://www.facebook.com/pg/volunteerresourceteam

Address: Center Camp
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The V-Spot is Burning Man’s official Volunteer Resource Team's headquarters in Black Rock City. The Volunteer Resource Team helps turn citizens into participants throughout the year and at Black Rock City.
Also at 3:00 and A and 9:00 and A.
Contact: vspot@burningman.org

Placemark.name: V-Spot 9
Placemark.description:
Address: 9:00 and Awe
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: V-Spot9 is Burning Man’s Volunteer Resource Team's 9:00 location in Black Rock City. The Volunteer Resource Team helps turn citizens into participants throughout the year and at Black Rock City.

Contact: vspot@burningman.org
https://www.facebook.com/pg/volunteerresourceteam

Data.name: Description
Data.value: V-Spot9 is Burning Man’s Volunteer Resource Team's 9:00 location in Black Rock City. The Volunteer Resource Team helps turn citizens into participants throughout the year and at Black Rock City.

Placemark.name: Lamplighter Chapel and Village
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:45 and Rod's Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Volunteer to be a Lamplighter daily at 5pm. No experience is required. We welcome virgin and seasoned burners alike.
Contact: http://burningman.org/event/volunteering/teams/lamplighters

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Volunteer to be a Lamplighter daily at 5pm. No experience is required. We welcome virgin and seasoned burners alike.

Placemark.name: Burning Man Earth Guardians
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:45 and Rod's Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Leave No Trace! http://earthguardians.net We inspire inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply Leave No Trace (LNT) principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come volunteer and participate in our daily yoga talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!
Contact: earthguardians@burningman.org

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Leave No Trace! http://earthguardians.net We inspire inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply Leave No Trace (LNT) principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come volunteer and participate in our daily yoga talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!

Placemark.name: Temple Guardians
Placemark.description:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/1Rdqven5MZI

Address: 5:30 and Esplanade
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Temple Guardians are committed to holding the sacred space of the Temple at Burning Man. We provide the Temple with grounding and love. We follow a philosophy that calls for small pushes from a great distance to hold the sacred space of the Temple. Nothing is added but what participants create themselves.

Training for new and veteran guardians happens here Sunday through Wednesday with Burn Perimeter training on Friday

Contact: https://www.facebook.com/groups/TempleGuardians/

Data.name: Description
Data.value:
The Temple Guardians are committed to holding the sacred space of the Temple at Burning Man. We provide the Temple with grounding and love. We follow a philosophy that calls for small pushes from a great distance to hold the sacred space of the Temple. Nothing is added but what participants create themselves.
Training for new and veteran guardians happens here Sunday through Wednesday with Burn Perimeter training on Friday

Placemark.name: BMIR
Placemark.description:
Address: 12:30 and Rod's Road
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Burning Man Information Radio
BMIR 94.5 FM the voice of the man
24/7 community radio and lounge.
Broadcasting over the air on the playa at 94.5 FM and streaming live from Burning Man and year round at http://www.bmir.org
BMIR is the official radio station of Burning Man.  Tune into BMIR for a wide variety of news, information and entertainment including artist and participant interviews, burn times, weather and playa news.
GARS is the spanky new Gate Advisory Radio Station.  Traffic updates and Gate Info will be broadcast on 95.1 this year
Contact: bmir@burningman.org

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Burning Man Information Radio BMIR 94.5 FM the voice of the man 24/7 community radio and lounge. Broadcasting over the air on the playa at 94.5 FM and streaming live from Burning Man and year round at http://www.bmir.org BMIR is the official radio station of Burning Man. Tune into BMIR for a wide variety of news, information and entertainment including artist and participant interviews, burn times, weather and playa news. GARS is the spanky new Gate Advisory Radio Station. Traffic updates and Gate Info will be broadcast on 95.1 this year

Placemark.name: Mobility Camp
Placemark.description:
Address: 7:30 and Center Camp
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Mobility Camp .provides wheelchair friendly art and playatours for the mobility challenged, the walking wounded, and the able bodied – ‘worst come first served’ – in that order. We also provide a charging station for medical equipment, as well as educational support for the mobility challenged both on and off the Playa, and we provide somewhat rustic wheelchair friendly camping facilities!

Tours of the Art and the Playa leave Mobility Camp 4x daily, except for the Major Burns…..we run 3x those epic days and evenings, as our sunset tour combines with our night tour.

Tours Run at: 5:45 am – 9 am – 6 pm – 9 pm – Come by Mobility Camp as soon as you hit the Playa to sign up for a tour! Tours last about 1.5 – 2 hours – and run no specific route as we have several different drivers.

Contact: http://www.mobilitycamp.org/

Data.name: Description
Data.value:
Mobility Camp .provides wheelchair friendly art and playatours for the mobility challenged, the walking wounded, and the able bodied – ‘worst come first served’ – in that order. We also provide a charging station for medical equipment, as well as educational support for the mobility challenged both on and off the Playa, and we provide somewhat rustic wheelchair friendly camping facilities!
Tours of the Art and the Playa leave Mobility Camp 4x daily, except for the Major Burns…..we run 3x those epic days and evenings, as our sunset tour combines with our night tour.
Tours Run at: 5:45 am – 9 am – 6 pm – 9 pm – Come by Mobility Camp as soon as you hit the Playa to sign up for a tour! Tours last about 1.5 – 2 hours – and run no specific route as we have several different drivers.

Placemark.name: Recycle Camp
Placemark.description:
Address: 6:00 and Center Camp Plaza (Inner Circle)
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Aluminum Can Recycling (open Mon-Sun 9am-5pm) -- You can stop by to crush and recycle your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp. Be sure to come by before they close Sunday evening! Recycle Camp can be found at 6:00 ON THE INNER CIRCLE OF CENTER CAMP, just behind the Center Camp Café.
Contact: recycle@burningman.com

Placemark.name: DMV
Placemark.description:
Address: 12:30 and Rod's Road (Esplanade at the Keyhole)
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Department of Mutant Vehicles licenses all mutant vehicles and disabled persons' vehicles allowed to drive during the event. Open starting Saturday 8/26 through Wed 8/30 from 11am-10:30pm. Thurs 8/31 through Friday 9/1 from 11am-11pm. Saturday 9/2 (Burn Night) from 11am-2pm. 
Contact: dmv@burningman.org

Data.value: 12:30 and Rod's Road (Esplanade at the Keyhole)

Placemark.name: Art Car Camp
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:30 and Esplanade
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Art Car Camp at Burning Man was started in 1994 by art car creator, documentarian and promoter, Harrod Blank. As the Burning Man Festival has grown, art vehicles have become more elaborate and fantastical (now known as "Mutant Vehicles"). Many of the original "art cars" that once roamed the playa freely can no longer get licensed by the Black Rock DMV. Art Car Camp celebrates these street legal, permanently altered "daily drivers". Our camp also has a few Mutant Vehicles including one of the very first to ever drive the Playa, Pepper Mouser's Motorized Living Room!" Come and see the origin point of Art Cars at Black Rock City! | Our M-USED Car Lot will be on display 24 Hours along with our gallery tent which has some chill space while you check out images of Art Cars from around the U.S. and Canada.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Art Car Camp at Burning Man was started in 1994 by art car creator, documentarian and promoter, Harrod Blank. As the Burning Man Festival has grown, art vehicles have become more elaborate and fantastical (now known as "Mutant Vehicles"). Many of the original "art cars" that once roamed the playa freely can no longer get licensed by the Black Rock DMV. Art Car Camp celebrates these street legal, permanently altered "daily drivers". Our camp also has a few Mutant Vehicles including one of the very first to ever drive the Playa, Pepper Mouser's Motorized Living Room!" Come and see the origin point of Art Cars at Black Rock City! | Our M-USED Car Lot will be on display 24 Hours along with our gallery tent which has some chill space while you check out images of Art Cars from around the U.S. and Canada.

Placemark.name: Black Rock Community Transit
Placemark.description:
Address: 5:30 and Awe
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: BRC's Community YELLOW BIKE Program. Black Rock Community Transit runs and operates the Yellow Bike Program. The Yellow Bikes are community bikes to mobilize all citizens of Black Rock City (hint: they are painted GREEN)
Contact: https://www.facebook.com/BlackRockCommunityTransitYellowBikes/

Placemark.description:
Address: 6:15 and Juju
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Transportation between SF or Reno and BRC.
Contact: https://burnerexpress.burningman.org/burner-express-bus-tickets/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Transportation between SF or Reno and BRC.

Placemark.name: Burner Express Air
Placemark.description:
Address: Airport Road and Trash Fence
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Burner Express Air (BxA) is a charter air transportation service that will transport Burners from Southern California, the San Francisco Bay Area, and Reno to Black Rock City (BRC) and back. The intent of BxA is to facilitate flight bookings for participants, reduce traffic on the roadways, and streamline operations at Black Rock City Municipal Airport. In 2017, flights to BRC will begin as early as Wednesday, August 23, and will run through Monday September 4. You can make round-trip or one-way (to or from BRC) bookings for yourself and your friends, or request a whole plane from the areas above or anywhere in the US!
Contact: https://burnerexpress.burningman.org/burner-express-air-information/

Data.name: Description
Data.value: Burner Express Air (BxA) is a charter air transportation service that will transport Burners from Southern California, the San Francisco Bay Area, and Reno to Black Rock City (BRC) and back. The intent of BxA is to facilitate flight bookings for participants, reduce traffic on the roadways, and streamline operations at Black Rock City Municipal Airport. In 2017, flights to BRC will begin as early as Wednesday, August 23, and will run through Monday September 4. You can make round-trip or one-way (to or from BRC) bookings for yourself and your friends, or request a whole plane from the areas above or anywhere in the US!

Placemark.name: Deep-Playa Music Zone (DMZ)
Placemark.description:
Address: 10:30-11:15 and Kundalini
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: We have established a zone where Mutant Vehicles using large sound systems who will attract large crowds can park and party in the deep playa for extended periods of time. The zone is 5,340 feet from The Man between the 10:30 and 11:15 clock positions with banks of toilets at each end. This distance out follows the arc of K Street. The length of the arc is 1,747 feet. Art placement will be modified to accommodate this zone.

This zone allows for a longer stay — up to 12 hours — and it provides sanitary stations and Emergency Services medical personnel at this fixed site. The area is large enough for several vehicles to occupy the zone. Their speakers must be turned out and away from the city. The restriction of no “encampments” still applies: no camping or setting up speakers or other type of structures on the ground. Of course, Leave No Trace practices must be employed.
Contact:

Data.name: Description
Data.value:
We have established a zone where Mutant Vehicles using large sound systems who will attract large crowds can park and party in the deep playa for extended periods of time. The zone is 5,340 feet from The Man between the 10:30 and 11:15 clock positions with banks of toilets at each end. This distance out follows the arc of K Street. The length of the arc is 1,747 feet. Art placement will be modified to accommodate this zone.
This zone allows for a longer stay — up to 12 hours — and it provides sanitary stations and Emergency Services medical personnel at this fixed site. The area is large enough for several vehicles to occupy the zone. Their speakers must be turned out and away from the city. The restriction of no “encampments” still applies: no camping or setting up speakers or other type of structures on the ground. Of course, Leave No Trace practices must be employed.

Placemark.name: Burn Garden
Placemark.description:
Address: 3:00 and Esplanade
Location: Black Rock City, NV
Description: Metal platforms for burning wood are located at Esplanade and 3:00, 6:00, and 9:00. From Sunday, September 3 at 10 am through Tuesday, September 5, each Burn Garden location will be available for wood burning as well as donations of new and unused lumber. Wood only! No burning of cardboard, paper, compost, recycling or trash will be accepted. Burning toxic and/or synthetic materials such as couches, stuffed furniture, rugs, PVC pipes, etc. is prohibited by law. Burn Garden attendants will be on hand to support your wood burning needs.
Contact:
